front.title: Data Over Cable System Interface Specification Quality of Service Management Information Base (DOCSIS-QOS MIB)

abstract.t: This document defines a basic set of managed objects for SNMP-based management of extended QOS features of Cable Modems (CMs) and Cable Modem Termination Systems (CMTSs) conforming to the Data over Cable System (DOCSIS) standard version 1.1 and 2.0.
